title: Wi-Fi connection keeps dropping in conference room
description: The Wi-Fi connection in Conference Room B keeps disconnecting every 10-15 minutes during important client meetings. This is causing disruptions and affecting our presentations. The issue started yesterday morning.

title: Desktop computer won't boot up
description: My workstation computer is not starting up at all. When I press the power button, the fans spin for a few seconds and then everything shuts down. No display appears on the monitor. I need this urgently for production planning.

title: Patient management system running very slowly
description: Our patient management software has become extremely slow over the past week. It takes 2-3 minutes to load patient records and the system frequently freezes when trying to update information. This is impacting patient care.

title: Unable to access financial reporting system
description: I'm getting an 'Access Denied' error when trying to log into our QuickBooks Enterprise system. My credentials were working fine last week. I need access to generate month-end reports.

title: VPN connection fails when working from warehouse
description: I cannot establish a VPN connection from our secondary warehouse location. The connection times out after attempting to connect. I need access to the main inventory system to process shipments.

title: Label printer not working at front desk
description: The Zebra label printer at the front desk is not printing guest wristbands. The printer shows as online but nothing comes out when we try to print. We have checked the label roll and it's properly loaded.

title: Teams meetings audio cutting out frequently
description: During Microsoft Teams video calls, the audio keeps cutting out for other participants. They can see me but can't hear me properly. This is affecting client presentations and internal meetings.

title: Need access to new supplier database
description: Please grant me read and write access to the new supplier management database that was recently implemented. I need this access to update organic certification records for our vendors.

title: Setup required for new project manager
description: We have a new project manager starting Monday who needs a complete workstation setup including access to AutoCAD, project management software, and the shared construction documents folder.

title: Suspicious email with attachment received
description: I received an email claiming to be from a parent with a suspicious attachment named 'student_grades.exe'. The email address looks fake and I haven't clicked anything. Please investigate this potential security threat.
